name: starbase-80
description: Starbase 80 is a self-hosted media and link dashboard styled like a retro space station. It organizes shortcuts, widgets, and stats into a playful, customizable homepage.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Displays services and links in space station-themed interface

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Organizes quick links to self-hosted applications

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Switches between retro sci-fi themes and color schemes

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Finds services and links quickly with keyboard shortcuts

features.title: Icon Library
features.description: Uses built-in icons or custom images for services
